go_data.justification: VAMP8 binds directly to the ubiquitously expressed, PtdIns4,5P2-binding, endocytic clathrin adaptor CALM/PICALM.
VAMP8 mediates the fusion of vesicles with early endosomes/recycling endosomes.
VAMP8 is internalized from the plasma membrane by clathrin-mediated endocytosis.
VAMP8 is involved in the trafficking of proteins through the endocytic pathway.
VAMP8 is localized to the plasma membrane and cycles between the plasma membrane and endosomes.
